out there in the cosmos back in 1977 the
aptly named Big Ear telescope in Ohio

signals coming from the stars this
careful listening has been the basis of
much of SETI the search for
extraterrestrial intelligence based on
the theory that an advanced alien
civilization will like us be
intentionally or accidentally beaming

world's most powerful radio telescopes
have been used in the search since 1960
but on the whole they've turned up
nothing
note that is except at Big Ear in 1977
on August the 15th with the telescope
picked up an intense flash a radio
energy right in the frequency that

coming from the constellation of
Sagittarius and registering on the paper
read out to over 30 times the background

and wrote Wow in the margin it's now
known among the SETI community as the
WoW signal and even 40 years on we still
don't know exactly what caused it part
of the problem is that the radio show
hasn't been heard since despite
astronomers having searched over 50
times and without the chance to make

way of saying if the WoW signal was our

processes or secret military operations

planets
Tabby's star as its affectionately known
is occasionally dimmed by up to 22
percent of its normal brightness
presumably by something passing in front

block 22 percent of the light another

solar panels all the way around a star
in three dimensions would intersect its

to any outside observers like us
